source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: Maya and Substance Painter Model and texture Old 3D Robot
items.headline: How to modling and textures old robot in MAYA & Substance painter
objectives_summary: Be able to model in Maya in a simplified way
UV Map in Maya in an automated manner
Substance Painter Recognition

items.title: Animate a Professional Looking Walk in Autodesk Maya
items.headline: Learn professional 3D animation workflows by animating and delivering a high quality female walk in Autodesk Maya
objectives_summary: Animate a professional looking walk in Autodesk Maya
Work with video references
Identify and design the key poses of a walk

items.title: How to Draw Cartoon Sketches
items.headline: Learn the drawing BASICS of cartooning, from the experienced ex-Disney, Warner Bros. and S. Spielberg cartoonist!
objectives_summary: learn the basics of drawing, essential simplest materials such as most ordinary pencils and papers and get enough self confidence to proceed further on their own.
sketch their own roughs and tighten them, make the roughs voluminous and be able to embellish them in a clean 'readable' way.

items.title: Adobe After Effects: Infographics & data visualization
items.headline: Learn how to use Adobe after effects To Create infographics & data visualization
objectives_summary: Create Animated infographics: line Graphs, Bar Charts and Pie Charts  in after effects
Use special effects and presets to create graphs  in after effects
Understand and Use expressions to help create charts  in after effects

items.title: Fusion 360: Create a slide and pop mechanism

visible_instructors.name: Mahmoud
visible_instructors.title: Mahmoud Shehata
visible_instructors.job_title: Self-taught developer, Mechanical Designer and researcher

items.headline: Learn how to design advanced parts and master top-down assembly design in Fusion 360 by designing this cool mechanism.
objectives_summary: Design simple parts and gears easily using the Model Workspace.
Use the Assemble toolbox to make advanced mechanical assemblies.
Design complex assemblies using Top-Down design approach.

items.title: Creating character using 3ds max and Substance Painter
items.headline: Series of lectures how to create an awesome robot character in 3d max and texture it using Substance Painter
objectives_summary: Create character fast and easy
Get best knowledge of Substance painter texturing your character
Visualise your characters in the best way using 3ds max

items.title: Female Character Portrait Creation - Complete Film Pipeline

visible_instructors.name: Victory3D
visible_instructors.title: Victory3D LLC
visible_instructors.job_title: Dedicated to Transforming The Way Artists Create

items.headline: Realistic Character Sculpting & Modeling using Zbrush, Mari, Marvelous Designer, Maya & Photoshop
objectives_summary: Sculpt a female character from head to toe
Sculpt believable clothing
Full body UDIM workflow

items.title: How to Make a Professional 2D Animation for a Promo Video
items.headline: Create an animation in After Effects with Cinema 4D and Illustrator in a real world project step by step from scratch.
objectives_summary: Approach and animate a professional promotional 2D animated video for a client according to a provided script and how to use Adobe After Effects along with vector assets and a 3D model to create the final motion graphics piece.
Apply best practices to deal with big animation projects using After Effects while being organized at the same time.
Organize vector assets for animations and basic rigging inside After Effects

items.title: Learn to Sculpt a Stylized Character for Games with ZBrush

visible_instructors.name: 3dmotive
visible_instructors.title: 3dmotive LLC
visible_instructors.job_title: High Quality 3d and Game Art Training by Industry Pros!

items.headline: In this intermediate course, we will learn to 3d sculpt a High Resolution character asset for film and games!
objectives_summary: Digitally Sculpt a 3d character using ZBrush for Games or Film
Understand the basics of modeling a 3d character using ZBrush
Understand the basic pipeline for digital sculpting for CG, film, and game

items.title: Anime Studio Pro 10 Tutorial - A Practical Training Course
items.headline: Infinite Skills shows you everything you need to make amazing, professional animations.
objectives_summary: Learn how to create professional drawings and animations with Anime Pro

items.title: Animate a Rocket Launch: Smoke & Fire Simulation in Blender
items.headline: Learn 3D Animation, Hard Surface Modeling, Realistic Texturing, Fluid Simulation in Blender
objectives_summary: Master Fire & Smoke Simulation in Blender
Understand Force Fields & Use them in Blender
Animate Rocket Launch into Space

items.title: Alight Motion Create Stunning motion graphics on smartphone
items.headline: Beginners to advanced level course : Create motion graphics like a Pro on your smartphone with animation principles
objectives_summary: Create world class professional Motion graphics animation with Alight Motion app on Android, iPhone and iPad
Creatively apply industry standard principles of Animation in Alight Motion projects
Master the entire Alight Motion app workflow

items.title: Easy Character Posing with Design Doll
items.headline: Learn how to pose characters with the perfect proportions, perfect pose and perfect angle in the easiest way possible.
objectives_summary: You will be able to pose characters easily in any angle
Your drawing skills will increase because characters will have the correct proportions

items.title: CNC programming with SolidWorks CAM
items.headline: An introduction to SolidWorks CAM
objectives_summary: Using SolidWorks CAM to program for CNC machines

items.title: After Effects: Simple Character Animation & Motion Graphics
items.headline: Learn After Effects CC to Improve your videos and animations. Create Simple Walking Character. Improve your motion!
objectives_summary: How to use After Effect
Simple Walking Character
What it takes to create a smooth 2D animation

items.title: After Effects : Create Text Animation Effects For Beginners!
items.headline: Learn how to use the extremely powerful Adobe After Effects to create some awesome text animation effects
objectives_summary: BE FAMILIAR with Adobe After Effects layout, essential key terms and basic features
ACQUIRE different and powerful skills to create stunning Text Animation Effects in Adobe After Effects
CREATE PARTICLES Text Animation using Adobe After Effects
